response.answer_text: I think you mean a trademark, where only one company can use that word. It it were copyrighted, your sentence above would be illegal copyright infringement. No, K-pop is just a description, like the words “bakery” or “camera”. You cannot copyright a single word and trademark registrations cannot be done on descriptions. The “Canon 5D camera” is a trademark that includes the word camera, but I cannot register just the word camera and prevent Nikon from describing their products with that name.
